You defeat each subsystem separately. But in order to defeat the entire system, you must shut down the reactor. It's located in the basement, along with the supercomputer that controls everything. Obviously, this area presents the greatest challenge.
Obviously.

What kind of research? Reich considers not telling him. He delays, sipping wine, cutting another bite of meat. Then:
Vincent was researching weather control... a way to stop the storms — THE STORM — and return the earth to its original weather pattern. Garth laughs. Redemption? It seems absurd. (CONTINUED )

stands and walks to the window. The city lights are fires consuming furniture and dreams. Reich joins him.
